comment: Many problems in this aap like many sites are doesn't work properly some sites taken so much time in refreshing First off all thanku for reply my message! I check my internet is properly work and other apps are properly working but many sites in chrome are doesn't work properly it takes so much time to refresh 馃槙
scenarios: Some sites in Chrome take too much time to refresh.
key sentence: Some sites in Chrome take too much time to refresh.
the function of activity: The activity consolidates essential browser and application functions, including navigation, bookmarking, downloading, tab management, privacy, customization, and content translating, content sharing for enhanced user experience and accessibility.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Device Picker', 'description': 'Displays a list of devices to share a tab with. Users can swipe down to close this interface.'}, {'name': 'Send to Device', 'description': 'Allows users to send a tab to selected devices from the device picker list.'}, {'name': 'Device Management', 'description': 'Users can manage their devices linked to their account, with options to view activity status.'}, {'name': 'Search Box', 'description': 'Allows users to search or type a URL directly.'}, {'name': 'Voice Search', 'description': "Initiates a search using the user's voice input, providing a convenient hands-free option."}, {'name': 'Google Lens Search', 'description': 'Enables users to search using their camera with Google Lens, integrating image recognition into search.'}, {'name': 'Quick Navigation Tiles', 'description': 'Provides quick access to frequently visited sites such as YouTube, Facebook, or Wikipedia through predefined tiles.'}, {'name': 'Options for Discover', 'description': 'Opens a menu with additional options related to content in the Discover feed.'}, {'name': 'Share Content', 'description': 'Allows users to share articles or posts from the Discover feed with others.'}, {'name': 'Home Button', 'description': 'Navigates the user back to the homepage of the browser.'}, {'name': 'Tab Switcher', 'description': 'Enables users to switch between, view, or close open tabs in their browser session.'}, {'name': 'Settings Access', 'description': 'Provides access to the settings menu where users can customize browser preferences and view account information.'}, {'name': 'Main Menu', 'description': 'Opens a menu for users to customize and control various settings and features in Google Chrome.'}]
